text:
Veteran Bollywood actor and film-maker Manoj Kumar is working on his next directorial venture which would be based on mathematician and astronomer Aryabhata.

“I’m going to return as a director soon. I am working on a film on Aryabhata. It is an interesting story to tell viewers about his contribution,” said Kumar, who was announced the winner of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award on Friday.

“Three years we have been working on script, as it is a difficult subject to deal with,” the 78-year-old added. Aryabhata was a pioneer during the classical age of Indian mathematics and Indian astronomy.

Kumar is scouting for newcomers for the film.

“We are working with Kishore Namit Kapoor who has trained some of the most prominent film actors. He will help us with it (casting),” Kumar said. — PTI
title: Soon, a film on astronomer Aryabhata
